Song.title: Happy Day
Song.copyright: Words and music by Tim Hughes and Ben Cantelon. Â© 2006 Thankyou Music (Admin. by EMI Christian Music Publishing)

Arrangement.text:
Verse 1: [A]The greatest day in history [D2]Death is beaten You have rescued me [F#m7]Sing it out Jesus is al[D2]ive [A]The empty cross the empty grave [D2]Life Eternal You have won the day [F#m7]Shout it out Jesus is al[D2]ive He's al[Esus]ive
Chorus: And [A]oh happy d[D2]ay happy d[F#m7]ay You w[E]ashed my sin away [A]Oh happy d[D2]ay happy d[F#m7]ay I'll n[E]ever be the sam[A]e [D2 F#m7] For[E]ever I am change[A/C# D2 F#m7 E]d
Verse 2: [A]When I stand in that place [D2]Free at last meeting face to face [F#m7]I am Yours Jesus You are m[D2]ine [A]Endless joy perfect peace [D2]Earthly pain finally will cease [F#m7]Celebrate Jesus is al[D2]ive He's al[Esus]ive
{new_page} Bridge:
[F#m7]Oh, what a glorious [C#m7]day what a glorious [D2]way That [A]You have saved me[E] And [F#m7]Oh, what a glorious [C#m7]day what a glorious [D2]day
Chorus: And [A]oh happy d[D2]ay happy d[F#m7]ay You w[E]ashed my sin away [A]Oh happy d[D2]ay happy d[F#m7]ay I'll n[E]ever be the sam[A]e [D2 F#m7] For[E]ever I am change[A/C# D2 F#m7 E]d
Arrangement.searchtext: verse 1 the greatest day in history death is beaten you have rescued me sing it out jesus is alive the empty cross the empty grave life eternal you have won the day shout it out jesus is alive hes alive chorus and oh happy day happy day you washed my sin away oh happy day happy day ill never be the same forever i am changed verse 2 when i stand in that place free at last meeting face to face i am yours jesus you are mine endless joy perfect peace earthly pain finally will cease celebrate jesus is alive hes alive bridge oh what a glorious day what a glorious way that you have saved me and oh what a glorious day what a glorious day chorus and oh happy day happy day you washed my sin away oh happy day happy day ill never be the same forever i am changed
